ZKN_LETSGO_063_000	Sleeps 18 hours a day. If it senses danger, it will teleport itself to safety even as it sleeps.
ZKN_LETSGO_064_000	Many odd things happen if this Pokémon is close by. For example, it makes clocks run backward.
ZKN_LETSGO_065_000	A Pokémon that can memorize anything. It never forgets what it learns—that's why this Pokémon is smart.
ZKN_LETSGO_066_000	Very powerful in spite of its small size. Its mastery of many types of martial arts makes it very tough.
ZKN_LETSGO_067_000	The belt around its waist holds back its energy. Without it, this Pokémon would be unstoppable.
ZKN_LETSGO_068_000	One arm alone can move mountains. Using all four arms, this Pokémon fires off awesome punches.
ZKN_LETSGO_069_000	Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.
ZKN_LETSGO_070_000	When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.
ZKN_LETSGO_071_000	Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.
ZKN_LETSGO_072_000	It can sometimes be found all dry and shriveled up on a beach. Toss it back into the sea to revive it.
ZKN_LETSGO_073_000	Its 80 tentacles can stretch and contract freely. They wrap around prey and weaken it with poison.
ZKN_LETSGO_074_000	Commonly found near mountain trails and the like. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.
ZKN_LETSGO_075_000	Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid.
ZKN_LETSGO_076_000	Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it's exposed to air.
ZKN_LETSGO_077_000	Capable of jumping incredibly high. Its hooves and sturdy legs absorb the impact of a hard landing.
ZKN_LETSGO_078_000	Just loves to run. If it sees something faster than itself, it will give chase at top speed.
ZKN_LETSGO_079_000	Incredibly slow and sluggish. It is quite content to loll about without worrying about the time.
ZKN_LETSGO_080_000	Lives lazily by the sea. If the Shellder on its tail comes off, it becomes a Slowpoke again.
ZKN_LETSGO_081_000	It is hatched with the ability to defy gravity. It floats while emitting powerful electromagnetic waves.
ZKN_LETSGO_082_000	Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6 degrees Fahrenheit within 3,300 feet.
ZKN_LETSGO_083_000	They live where reedy plants grow. Farfetch'd are rarely seen, so it's thought their numbers are decreasing.
ZKN_LETSGO_084_000	Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.
ZKN_LETSGO_085_000	One of Doduo's two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies.
ZKN_LETSGO_086_000	Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.
ZKN_LETSGO_087_000	Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.
ZKN_LETSGO_088_000	Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won't grow in its path.
ZKN_LETSGO_089_000	Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell.
ZKN_LETSGO_090_000	The shell can withstand any attack. However, when it is open, the tender body is exposed.
ZKN_LETSGO_091_000	For protection, it uses its harder-than-diamond shell. It also shoots spikes from the shell.
ZKN_LETSGO_092_000	Said to appear in decrepit, deserted buildings. It has no real shape, as it appears to be made of a gas.
ZKN_LETSGO_093_000	By licking, it saps the victim's life. It causes shaking that won't stop until the victim's demise.
ZKN_LETSGO_094_000	A Gengar is close by if you feel a sudden chill. It may be trying to lay a curse on you.
ZKN_LETSGO_095_000	Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by Diglett.
ZKN_LETSGO_096_000	If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it had eaten in the past.
ZKN_LETSGO_097_000	Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
ZKN_LETSGO_098_000	Its pincers are superb weapons. They sometimes break off during battle, but they grow back fast.
ZKN_LETSGO_099_000	One claw grew massively and is as hard as steel. It has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, it is too heavy.
ZKN_LETSGO_100_000	It is said to camouflage itself as a Poké Ball. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.
ZKN_LETSGO_101_000	Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.
ZKN_LETSGO_102_000	The heads attract each other and spin around. There must be six heads for it to maintain balance.
ZKN_LETSGO_103_000	Its cries are very noisy. This is because each of the three heads thinks about whatever it likes.
ZKN_LETSGO_104_000	Wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.
ZKN_LETSGO_105_000	Small and weak, this Pokémon is adept with its bone club. It has grown more vicious over the ages.
ZKN_LETSGO_106_000	When kicking, the sole of its foot turns as hard as a diamond on impact and destroys its enemy.
ZKN_LETSGO_107_000	Punches in corkscrew fashion. It can punch its way through a concrete wall like a drill.
ZKN_LETSGO_108_000	Its tongue spans almost seven feet and moves more freely than its forelegs. Its licks can cause paralysis.
ZKN_LETSGO_109_000	In hot places, its internal gases could expand and explode without any warning. Be very careful!
ZKN_LETSGO_110_000	This Pokémon lives and grows by absorbing poison gas, dust, and germs that exist inside garbage.
ZKN_LETSGO_111_000	A Pokémon with a one-track mind. Once it charges, it won't stop running until it falls asleep.
ZKN_LETSGO_112_000	Its brain developed when it began walking on its hind legs. Its armor-like hide even repels molten lava.
ZKN_LETSGO_113_000	A gentle and kindhearted Pokémon that shares its nutritious eggs if it sees an injured Pokémon.
ZKN_LETSGO_114_000	Its identity is obscured by masses of thick blue vines. The vines are said to never stop growing.
ZKN_LETSGO_115_000	Raises its young in its belly pouch. Won't run from any fight to keep its young protected.
ZKN_LETSGO_116_000	If it senses any danger, it will vigorously spray water or a special type of ink from its mouth.
ZKN_LETSGO_117_000	Touching the back fin causes numbness. It hooks its tail to coral to stay in place while sleeping.
ZKN_LETSGO_118_000	When it is time for them to lay eggs, they can be seen swimming up rivers and falls in large groups.
ZKN_LETSGO_119_000	It is the male's job to make a nest by carving out boulders in a stream using the horn on its head.
ZKN_LETSGO_120_000	As long as the center section is unharmed, this Pokémon can grow back fully even if it is chopped to bits.
ZKN_LETSGO_121_000	The center section is named the core. People think it is communicating when it glows in seven colors.
ZKN_LETSGO_122_000	Always practicing its pantomime act. It makes enemies believe something exists that really doesn't.
ZKN_LETSGO_123_000	Leaps out of tall grass and slices prey with its scythes. The movement looks like that of a ninja.
ZKN_LETSGO_124_000	Appears to move to a rhythm of its own, as if it were dancing. It wiggles its hips as it walks.
ZKN_LETSGO_125_000	If a major power outage occurs, it is certain that this Pokémon has eaten electricity at a power plant.
ZKN_LETSGO_126_000	Born in an active volcano. Its body is always cloaked in flames, so it looks like a big ball of fire.
ZKN_LETSGO_127_000	Grips its prey in its pincers and squeezes hard! It can't move if it's cold out, so it lives in warm places.
ZKN_LETSGO_128_000	A rowdy Pokémon with a lot of stamina. Once running, it won't stop until it hits something.
ZKN_LETSGO_129_000	Famous for being very unreliable. It can be found swimming in seas, lakes, rivers, and shallow puddles.
ZKN_LETSGO_130_000	Brutally vicious and enormously destructive. Known for totally destroying cities in ancient times.
ZKN_LETSGO_131_000	A gentle soul that can understand human speech. It can ferry people across the sea on its back.
ZKN_LETSGO_132_000	When it spots an enemy, its body transfigures into an almost-perfect copy of its opponent.
ZKN_LETSGO_133_000	It can evolve into a variety of forms. Eevee's genes are the key to solving the mysteries of Pokémon evolution.
ZKN_LETSGO_134_000	Its cell structure is similar to water molecules. It melts into the water and becomes invisible.
ZKN_LETSGO_135_000	A sensitive Pokémon that easily becomes sad or angry. Every time its mood changes, it charges power.
ZKN_LETSGO_136_000	It has a flame chamber inside its body. It inhales, then breathes out fire that is over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
ZKN_LETSGO_137_000	The only Pokémon that people anticipate can fly into space. None has managed the feat yet, however.
ZKN_LETSGO_138_000	An ancient Pokémon that was recovered from a fossil. It swam by cleverly twisting its 10 tentacles about.
ZKN_LETSGO_139_000	Its sharp beak rings its mouth. Its shell was too big for it to move freely, so it became extinct.
ZKN_LETSGO_140_000	A Pokémon that was recovered from a fossil. It used the eyes on its back while hiding on the seafloor.
ZKN_LETSGO_141_000	A slim and fast swimmer. It sliced its prey with its sharp sickles and drank the body fluids.
ZKN_LETSGO_142_000	A savage Pokémon that died out in ancient times. It was resurrected using DNA taken from amber.
ZKN_LETSGO_143_000	Will eat anything, even if the food happens to be a little moldy. It never gets an upset stomach.
ZKN_LETSGO_144_000	A legendary bird Pokémon. It freezes water that is contained in winter air and makes it snow.
ZKN_LETSGO_145_000	This legendary bird Pokémon is said to appear when the sky turns dark and lightning showers down.
ZKN_LETSGO_146_000	A legendary bird Pokémon. As it flaps its flaming wings, even the night sky will turn red.
ZKN_LETSGO_147_000	Long thought to be a myth, this Pokémon's existence was only recently confirmed by a fisherman who caught one.
ZKN_LETSGO_148_000	According to a witness, its body was surrounded by a strange aura that gave it a mystical look.
ZKN_LETSGO_149_000	It is said that this Pokémon lives somewhere in the sea and that it flies. However, these are only rumors.
ZKN_LETSGO_150_000	Its DNA is almost the same as Mew's. However, its size and disposition are vastly different.
ZKN_LETSGO_151_000	When viewed through a microscope, this Pokémon's short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.

ZKN_MOON_006_000	
ZKN_MOON_007_000	
ZKN_MOON_008_000	
ZKN_MOON_009_000	
ZKN_MOON_010_000	It's easy to catch, and it grows quickly, making it one of the top recommendations for novice Pokémon Trainers.
ZKN_MOON_011_000	Its shell is hard, but it's still just a bug shell. It's been known to break, so intense battles with it should be avoided.
ZKN_MOON_012_000	When attacked by other Pokémon, it defends itself by scattering its poisonous scales and fluttering its wings.
ZKN_MOON_013_000	
ZKN_MOON_014_000	
ZKN_MOON_015_000	
ZKN_MOON_016_000	
ZKN_MOON_017_000	
ZKN_MOON_018_000	
ZKN_MOON_019_000	With their strong capacity for survival, they can live in dirty places without concern. Left unchecked, their numbers multiply rapidly.
ZKN_MOON_020_000	Its disposition is far more violent than its looks would suggest. Don't let your hand get too close to its face, as it could bite your hand clean off.
ZKN_MOON_021_000	Farmers whose fields are troubled by bug Pokémon appreciate Spearow for its vigorous appetite and look after it.
ZKN_MOON_022_000	Drawings of a Pokémon resembling Fearow can be seen in murals from deep in ancient history.
ZKN_MOON_023_000	
ZKN_MOON_024_000	
ZKN_MOON_025_000	It's in its nature to store electricity. It feels stressed now and then if it's unable to fully discharge the electricity.
ZKN_MOON_026_000	It becomes aggressive when it has electricity stored up. At such times, even its Trainer has to take care to avoid being attacked.
ZKN_MOON_027_000	It usually makes its home in deserts and arid zones, where rain does not fall. It digs holes to catch Bug-type Pokémon.
ZKN_MOON_028_000	It uses its claws to climb trees and then curls its body into a spiny ball, ready to drop onto any prey that appears.
ZKN_MOON_029_000	
ZKN_MOON_030_000	
ZKN_MOON_031_000	
ZKN_MOON_032_000	
ZKN_MOON_033_000	
ZKN_MOON_034_000	
ZKN_MOON_035_000	On nights with a full moon, they gather together and dance. The surrounding area is enveloped in an abnormal magnetic field.
ZKN_MOON_036_000	According to tradition, people who see a pair of Clefable skipping by can look forward to a happy marriage.
ZKN_MOON_037_000	From its mouth spew flames that seem to resemble the spirits of the deceased. Some people mistakenly think this fire is a ghost.
ZKN_MOON_038_000	Said to live for a thousand years, this Pokémon uses its supernatural abilities to manipulate fire. It can burn its prey to a crisp as it pleases.
ZKN_MOON_039_000	Jigglypuff possess a vocal range that exceeds 12 octaves, but each individual's singing skill depends on its own effort.
ZKN_MOON_040_000	As it inhales, it expands...and expands...and expands. Wigglytuff compete to see which one can inflate itself the most.
ZKN_MOON_041_000	When exposed to sunlight, they suffer burns. The frequency of their ultrasonic waves can differ slightly from colony to colony.
ZKN_MOON_042_000	Sometimes they drink so much blood, they can't fly anymore. Then they fall to the ground and become food for other Pokémon.
ZKN_MOON_043_000	
ZKN_MOON_044_000	
ZKN_MOON_045_000	
ZKN_MOON_046_000	Mushrooms called tochukaso sprout from its back. They can be dried and powdered to make a medicine used to extend life.
ZKN_MOON_047_000	It scatters toxic spores from its mushroom cap. Once harvested, these spores can be steeped and boiled down to prepare herbal medicines.
ZKN_MOON_048_000	
ZKN_MOON_049_000	
ZKN_MOON_050_000	Many farmers cherish and nurture Diglett because its droppings enrich the soil it lives in.
ZKN_MOON_051_000	Despite the closeness between this Pokémon and farmers and other people, no one has ever seen the parts of it concealed underground.
ZKN_MOON_052_000	It loves shiny things. It often fights with Murkrow over prey they're both trying to catch.
ZKN_MOON_053_000	It has a high opinion of itself, although not to the same extent as the Alolan Persian. It's quite difficult to make friends with this Pokémon.
ZKN_MOON_054_000	This Pokémon is troubled by constant headaches. The more pain it’s in, the more powerful its psychokinesis becomes.
ZKN_MOON_055_000	It swims along the banks of lakes and catches fish Pokémon. It takes them to the shore and quietly eats them up.
ZKN_MOON_056_000	Its raging tires it out and causes it to fall asleep, but the anger resonating in its dreams causes it to wake up—which infuriates it all over again.
ZKN_MOON_057_000	Some researchers theorize that Primeape remains angry even when inside a Poké Ball.
ZKN_MOON_058_000	It looks cute, but when you approach another Trainer’s Growlithe, it will bark at you and bite.
ZKN_MOON_059_000	The fire burning inside its body serves as the energy to fuel it as it runs great distances. It appears in many legends.
ZKN_MOON_060_000	It’s still not very good at walking. Its Trainers should train this Pokémon to walk every day.
ZKN_MOON_061_000	It marches over the land in search of bug Pokémon to eat. Then it takes them underwater so it can dine on them where it’s safe.
ZKN_MOON_062_000	Its percentage of body fat is nearly zero. Its body is entirely muscle, which makes it heavy and forces its swimming prowess to develop.
ZKN_MOON_063_000	It can teleport itself to safety while it’s asleep, but when it wakes, it doesn’t know where it is, so it panics.
ZKN_MOON_064_000	Kadabra’s presence infests televisions and monitors with creepy shadows that bring bad luck.
ZKN_MOON_065_000	Its brain cells continue to increase in number until its death. The older the Alakazam, the larger its head.
ZKN_MOON_066_000	With its superhuman strength, it’s able to throw a hundred people all at the same time. Its strength comes from lifting Graveler every day.
ZKN_MOON_067_000	It willingly assists with hard labor because it knows the work is good training for its muscles.
ZKN_MOON_068_000	It can lift heavy loads with the greatest of ease. It can even heft dump trucks. But its clumsy fingers prevent it from doing any precision work.
ZKN_MOON_069_000	
ZKN_MOON_070_000	
ZKN_MOON_071_000	
ZKN_MOON_072_000	It drifts in shallow seas, such as the areas near beaches. If you get bitten or stabbed by its toxic tentacles, rush to the hospital.
ZKN_MOON_073_000	Although these Pokémon are rare, when a large outbreak of them occurs, all fish Pokémon disappear from the surrounding sea.
ZKN_MOON_074_000	There are plenty of them to be found along any road. A scholar with too much free time once counted a hundred of them along a single route.
ZKN_MOON_075_000	This slow-footed Pokémon moves by curling up and rolling instead of walking. With enough momentum, its speed can exceed 60 mph.
ZKN_MOON_076_000	Once a year, this Pokémon molts, and its shed shell returns to the soil. This process creates enriched soil, so farmers collect the shells.
ZKN_MOON_077_000	
ZKN_MOON_078_000	
ZKN_MOON_079_000	Alolan home cooking involves drying Slowpoke tails and then simmering them into a salty stew.
ZKN_MOON_080_000	Whenever Shellder bites down hard on its tail, it gives Slowbro a flash of inspiration...which it forgets a moment later.
ZKN_MOON_081_000	It sends out electromagnetic waves, which let it float through the air. Touching it while it’s eating electricity will give you a full-body shock.
ZKN_MOON_082_000	It has about three times the electrical power of Magnemite. For some reason, outbreaks of this Pokémon happen when lots of sunspots appear.
ZKN_MOON_083_000	
ZKN_MOON_084_000	
ZKN_MOON_085_000	
ZKN_MOON_086_000	
ZKN_MOON_087_000	
ZKN_MOON_088_000	It was born from sludge transformed by exposure to X-rays from the moon. When its internal load of germs decreases, it dies.
ZKN_MOON_089_000	After recent environmental improvements, this Pokémon is now hardly seen at all. People speculate that it may go extinct at some point.
ZKN_MOON_090_000	This Pokémon's tongue is always hanging out. It uses its tongue with great dexterity to dig up sand from the seabed in its search for food.
ZKN_MOON_091_000	Excavation of the tombs of ancient hunting tribes has turned up many spears tipped with spikes that had fallen off this Pokémon’s shell.
ZKN_MOON_092_000	Although Gastly is barely visible, when it’s near, a faint sweet smell lingers.
ZKN_MOON_093_000	It fears the light and revels in the dark. It may be on the verge of extinction in cities that stay brightly lit at night.
ZKN_MOON_094_000	It apparently wishes for a traveling companion. Since it was once human itself, it tries to create one by taking the lives of other humans.
ZKN_MOON_095_000	
ZKN_MOON_096_000	It finds really fun dreams tasty. When it makes friends with people, it may show them the most delicious dreams it’s ever eaten.
ZKN_MOON_097_000	As a matter of course, it makes anyone it meets fall asleep and has a taste of their dreams. Anyone having a good dream, it carries off.
ZKN_MOON_098_000	
ZKN_MOON_099_000	
ZKN_MOON_100_000	
ZKN_MOON_101_000	
ZKN_MOON_102_000	Six of them together form a full-fledged Pokémon. It’s often hunted by Crabrawler, but uses psychokinesis to drive it off.
ZKN_MOON_103_000	When the time comes, one of its three heads falls off. Before long, the fallen head grows into an Exeggcute.
ZKN_MOON_104_000	The skull it wears on its head is that of its dead mother. According to some, it will evolve when it comes to terms with the pain of her death.
ZKN_MOON_105_000	This Pokémon is out for vengeance on its natural enemy, Mandibuzz. It throws bones like boomerangs to try to take it down.

ZKN_MOON_114_000	
ZKN_MOON_115_000	The child in its pouch leaves home after roughly three years. That is the only time the mother is heard to cry wildly.
ZKN_MOON_116_000	
ZKN_MOON_117_000	
ZKN_MOON_118_000	Spellbound by the length of its horn and the beauty of its fins, many strange Trainers raise Goldeen and nothing but Goldeen.
ZKN_MOON_119_000	Trainers who are crazy for Seaking are divided into horn enthusiasts and fin enthusiasts. The two groups do not get along well.
ZKN_MOON_120_000	This Pokémon gets nibbled on by Lumineon and others. Thanks to its red core, it regenerates fast, so it's unconcerned by their snack attacks.
ZKN_MOON_121_000	Its unusual body shape, reminiscent of abstract art, led local people to spread rumors that this Pokémon may be an invader from outer space.
ZKN_MOON_122_000	
ZKN_MOON_123_000	While young, they live together deep in the mountains, training themselves in how to fight with their scythes and move at high speeds.
ZKN_MOON_124_000	
ZKN_MOON_125_000	Electricity leaks from it in amounts far greater than the amount of electricity it eats.
ZKN_MOON_126_000	When angered, it spouts brilliant fire from all over its body. It doesn't calm down until its opponent has burned to ash.
ZKN_MOON_127_000	One solid blow from its horns is enough to split apart a large tree. Its greatest rival in Alola is Vikavolt.
ZKN_MOON_128_000	Although it's known to be a fierce Pokémon, Tauros in the Alola region are said to possess a measure of calmness.
ZKN_MOON_129_000	Its reckless leaps make it easy pickings for predators. On the bright side, many Pokémon enjoy longer life spans, thanks to Magikarp.
ZKN_MOON_130_000	There are people who swear that any place Gyarados appears is fated for destruction.
ZKN_MOON_131_000	These Pokémon were once near extinction due to poaching. Following protective regulations, there is now an overabundance of them.
ZKN_MOON_132_000	With its astonishing capacity for metamorphosis, it can get along with anything. It does not get along well with its fellow Ditto.
ZKN_MOON_133_000	Current studies show it can evolve into an incredible eight different species of Pokémon.
ZKN_MOON_134_000	Blending in with the water and erasing all signs of its presence, it patiently waits for its prey, fish Pokémon.
ZKN_MOON_135_000	When its fur stands on end, that's a sign it's about to give off a jolt of electricity. Take care, as sometimes lightning strikes next to it, too.
ZKN_MOON_136_000	Its average body temperature is between 1,300 and 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. In its internal flame sac, temperatures reach 3,000 degrees.

ZKN_MOON_761_000	Although it's too sugary for human consumption, Bounsweet's sweat can be watered down into a juice with just the right amount of sweetness.
ZKN_MOON_762_000	This Pokémon is always bouncing around energetically. Other Pokémon are attracted by its lively appearance and pleasant aroma.
ZKN_MOON_763_000	A Pokémon known for the beauty of its well-shaped legs, it sometimes appears as a mascot in advertisements for beauty salons.
ZKN_MOON_764_000	Baths prepared with the flowers from its vine have a relaxing effect, so this Pokémon is a hit with many people.
ZKN_MOON_765_000	Deep in the jungle, high in the lofty canopy, this Pokémon abides. On rare occasions, it shows up at the beach to match wits with Slowking.
ZKN_MOON_766_000	They battle with hard berries for weapons. Their techniques are passed from the boss to the group, generation upon generation.
ZKN_MOON_767_000	Its habitat varies from beaches to seabeds. A natural scavenger, it will gleefully chow down on anything edible, no matter how rotten.
ZKN_MOON_768_000	It battles skillfully with its six arms, but spends most of its time peacefully meditating in caves deep beneath the sea.
ZKN_MOON_769_000	It takes control of anyone who puts a hand in its mouth. And so it adds to the accumulation of its sand-mound body.
ZKN_MOON_770_000	Buried beneath the castle are masses of dried-up bones from those whose vitality it has drained.
ZKN_MOON_771_000	These Pokémon line the beaches. The sticky mucous that covers their bodies can be used to soothe sunburned skin. How convenient!
ZKN_MOON_772_000	Due to the danger that this synthetic Pokémon may go on a rampage, it wears a control mask to restrain its power.
ZKN_MOON_773_000	Although its name was Type: Null at first, the boy who evolved it into this form gave it the name by which it is now known.
ZKN_MOON_774_000	Strong impacts can knock it out of its shell. This Pokémon was born from mutated nanoparticles.
ZKN_MOON_775_000	The log it holds was given to it by its parents at birth. It has also been known to cling to the arm of a friendly Trainer.
ZKN_MOON_776_000	It gushes fire and poisonous gases from its nostrils. Its dung is an explosive substance and can be put to various uses.
ZKN_MOON_777_000	The long hairs on its back act as lightning rods. The bolts of lightning it attracts are stored as energy in its electric sac.
ZKN_MOON_778_000	A lonely Pokémon, it conceals its terrifying appearance beneath an old rag so it can get closer to people and other Pokémon.
ZKN_MOON_779_000	It stuns its prey with psychokinesis and then grinds them to mush with its strong teeth. Even Shellder's shell is no match for it.
ZKN_MOON_780_000	This Pokémon is friendly to people and loves children most of all. It comes from deep in the mountains to play with children it likes in town.
ZKN_MOON_781_000	The soul of seaweed adrift in the waves became reborn as this Pokémon. It maintains itself with new infusions of seabed detritus and seaweed.
ZKN_MOON_782_000	They live in mountains where no trace of humans can be detected. Jangmo-o grow little by little as they battle one another.
ZKN_MOON_783_000	It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder and sharper each time they're regrown.
ZKN_MOON_784_000	Its rigid scales function as offense and defense. In the past, its scales were processed and used to make weapons and other commodities.
ZKN_MOON_785_000	It confuses its enemies by flying too quickly for the eye to follow. It has a hair-trigger temper but forgets what made it angry an instant later.
ZKN_MOON_786_000	As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health on the spot.
ZKN_MOON_787_000	The guardian deity of Ula'ula is a lazy Pokémon. It commands plants to immobilize its foes and then deals them a savage blow with its horns.
ZKN_MOON_788_000	The guardian deity of Poni, it can control water. People say it can create pure water that will wash away any uncleanness.
ZKN_MOON_789_000	In ages past, it was called the child of the stars. It's said to be a Pokémon from another world, but no specific details are known.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Text File : zukan_comment_omega_usa.msbt
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ZKN_OMEGA_000_000	
ZKN_OMEGA_001_000	Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
ZKN_OMEGA_002_000	There is a bud on this Pokémon's back. To support its weight, Ivysaur's legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it's a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
ZKN_OMEGA_003_000	There is a large flower on Venusaur's back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower's aroma soothes the emotions of people.
ZKN_OMEGA_004_000	The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is enjoying itself. If the Pokémon becomes enraged, the flame burns fiercely.
ZKN_OMEGA_005_000	Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.
ZKN_OMEGA_006_000	Charizard flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents. It breathes fire of such great heat that it melts anything. However, it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.
ZKN_OMEGA_007_000	Squirtle's shell is not merely used for protection. The shell's rounded shape and the grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water, enabling this Pokémon to swim at high speeds.
ZKN_OMEGA_008_000	Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as Wartortle ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon's toughness as a battler.
ZKN_OMEGA_009_000	Blastoise has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.
ZKN_OMEGA_010_000	Caterpie has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this Pokémon releases a terrifically strong odor.
ZKN_OMEGA_011_000	The shell covering this Pokémon's body is as hard as an iron slab. Metapod does not move very much. It stays still because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the hard shell.
ZKN_OMEGA_012_000	Butterfree has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can even search out, extract, and carry honey from flowers that are blooming over six miles from its nest.
ZKN_OMEGA_013_000	Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).
ZKN_OMEGA_014_000	Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
ZKN_OMEGA_015_000	Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.
ZKN_OMEGA_016_000	Pidgey has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.
ZKN_OMEGA_017_000	Pidgeotto claims a large area as its own territory. This Pokémon flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.
ZKN_OMEGA_018_000	This Pokémon has a dazzling plumage of beautifully glossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by the striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling them to choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.
ZKN_OMEGA_019_000	Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly listens by moving its ears around. It is not picky about where it lives—it will make its nest anywhere.
ZKN_OMEGA_020_000	Raticate's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
ZKN_OMEGA_021_000	Spearow has a very loud cry that can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
ZKN_OMEGA_022_000	Fearow is recognized by its long neck and elongated beak. They are conveniently shaped for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves its long and skinny beak to pluck prey.
ZKN_OMEGA_023_000	Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare from its upraised head.
ZKN_OMEGA_024_000	This Pokémon is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once Arbok wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.
ZKN_OMEGA_025_000	Whenever Pikachu comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity. If you come across a blackened berry, it's evidence that this Pokémon mistook the intensity of its charge.
ZKN_OMEGA_026_000	If the electrical sacs become excessively charged, Raichu plants its tail in the ground and discharges. Scorched patches of ground will be found near this Pokémon's nest.
ZKN_OMEGA_027_000	Sandshrew's body is configured to absorb water without waste, enabling it to survive in an arid desert. This Pokémon curls up to protect itself from its enemies.
ZKN_OMEGA_028_000	Sandslash's body is covered by tough spikes, which are hardened sections of its hide. Once a year, the old spikes fall out, to be replaced with new spikes that grow out from beneath the old ones.
ZKN_OMEGA_029_000	Nidoran♀ has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied Pokémon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.
ZKN_OMEGA_030_000	When Nidorina are with their friends or family, they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This Pokémon appears to become nervous if separated from the others.
ZKN_OMEGA_031_000	Nidoqueen's body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This Pokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
ZKN_OMEGA_032_000	Nidoran♂ has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanks to them, the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this Pokémon's notice.
ZKN_OMEGA_033_000	Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
ZKN_OMEGA_034_000	Nidoking's thick tail packs enormously destructive power. With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this Pokémon goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
ZKN_OMEGA_035_000	On every night of a full moon, groups of this Pokémon come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired Clefairy return to their quiet mountain retreats and go to sleep nestled up against each other.
ZKN_OMEGA_036_000	Clefable moves by skipping lightly as if it were flying using its wings. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. It is known to take strolls on lakes on quiet, moonlit nights.
ZKN_OMEGA_037_000	At the time of its birth, Vulpix has one white tail. The tail separates into six if this Pokémon receives plenty of love from its Trainer. The six tails become magnificently curled.
ZKN_OMEGA_038_000	Ninetales casts a sinister light from its bright red eyes to gain total control over its foe's mind. This Pokémon is said to live for a thousand years.
ZKN_OMEGA_039_000	Jigglypuff's vocal cords can freely adjust the wavelength of its voice. This Pokémon uses this ability to sing at precisely the right wavelength to make its foes most drowsy.
ZKN_OMEGA_040_000	Wigglytuff has large, saucerlike eyes. The surfaces of its eyes are always covered with a thin layer of tears. If any dust gets in this Pokémon's eyes, it is quickly washed away.
ZKN_OMEGA_041_000	Zubat remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
ZKN_OMEGA_042_000	Golbat loves to drink the blood of living things. It is particularly active in the pitch black of night. This Pokémon flits around in the night skies, seeking fresh blood.
ZKN_OMEGA_043_000	During the daytime, Oddish buries itself in soil to absorb nutrients from the ground using its entire body. The more fertile the soil, the glossier its leaves become.
ZKN_OMEGA_044_000	Gloom releases a foul fragrance from the pistil of its flower. When faced with danger, the stench worsens. If this Pokémon is feeling calm and secure, it does not release its usual stinky aroma.
ZKN_OMEGA_045_000	Vileplume's toxic pollen triggers atrocious allergy attacks. That's why it is advisable never to approach any attractive flowers in a jungle, however pretty they may be.
ZKN_OMEGA_046_000	Paras has parasitic mushrooms growing on its back called tochukaso. They grow large by drawing nutrients from this Bug Pokémon host. They are highly valued as a medicine for extending life.
ZKN_OMEGA_047_000	Parasect is known to infest large trees en masse and drain nutrients from the lower trunk and roots. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.
ZKN_OMEGA_048_000	Venonat is said to have evolved with a coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body for protection. It possesses large eyes that never fail to spot even minuscule prey.
ZKN_OMEGA_049_000	Venomoth is nocturnal—it is a Pokémon that only becomes active at night. Its favorite prey are small insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.
ZKN_OMEGA_050_000	Diglett are raised in most farms. The reason is simple— wherever this Pokémon burrows, the soil is left perfectly tilled for planting crops. This soil is made ideal for growing delicious vegetables.
ZKN_OMEGA_051_000	Dugtrio are actually triplets that emerged from one body. As a result, each triplet thinks exactly like the other two triplets. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly.
ZKN_OMEGA_052_000	Meowth withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to slinkily sneak about without making any incriminating footsteps. For some reason, this Pokémon loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
ZKN_OMEGA_053_000	Persian has six bold whiskers that give it a look of toughness. The whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in the Pokémon's surrounding vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
ZKN_OMEGA_054_000	Psyduck uses a mysterious power. When it does so, this Pokémon generates brain waves that are supposedly only seen in sleepers. This discovery spurred controversy among scholars.
ZKN_OMEGA_055_000	The webbed flippers on its forelegs and hind legs and the streamlined body of Golduck give it frightening speed. This Pokémon is definitely much faster than even the most athletic swimmer.
ZKN_OMEGA_056_000	When Mankey starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it's a sure sign that it is becoming angry. However, because it goes into a towering rage almost instantly, it is impossible for anyone to flee its wrath.
ZKN_OMEGA_057_000	When Primeape becomes furious, its blood circulation is boosted. In turn, its muscles are made even stronger. However, it also becomes much less intelligent at the same time.
ZKN_OMEGA_058_000	Growlithe has a superb sense of smell. Once it smells anything, this Pokémon won't forget the scent, no matter what. It uses its advanced olfactory sense to determine the emotions of other living things.
ZKN_OMEGA_059_000	Arcanine is known for its high speed. It is said to be capable of running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within this Pokémon's body is its source of power.
ZKN_OMEGA_060_000	Poliwag has a very thin skin. It is possible to see the Pokémon's spiral innards right through the skin. Despite its thinness, however, the skin is also very flexible. Even sharp fangs bounce right off it.
ZKN_OMEGA_061_000	The surface of Poliwhirl's body is always wet and slick with a slimy fluid. Because of this slippery covering, it can easily slip and slide out of the clutches of any enemy in battle.
ZKN_OMEGA_062_000	Poliwrath's highly developed, brawny muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. It is so tirelessly strong, this Pokémon can swim back and forth across the ocean without effort.
ZKN_OMEGA_063_000	Abra sleeps for eighteen hours a day. However, it can sense the presence of foes even while it is sleeping. In such a situation, this Pokémon immediately teleports to safety.
ZKN_OMEGA_064_000	Kadabra emits a peculiar alpha wave if it develops a headache. Only those people with a particularly strong psyche can hope to become a Trainer of this Pokémon.
ZKN_OMEGA_065_000	Alakazam's brain continually grows, making its head far too heavy to support with its neck. This Pokémon holds its head up using its psychokinetic power instead.
ZKN_OMEGA_066_000	Machop's muscles are special—they never get sore no matter how much they are used in exercise. This Pokémon has sufficient power to hurl a hundred adult humans.
ZKN_OMEGA_067_000	Machoke's thoroughly toned muscles possess the hardness of steel. This Pokémon has so much strength, it can easily hold aloft a sumo wrestler on just one finger.
ZKN_OMEGA_068_000	Machamp has the power to hurl anything aside. However, trying to do any work requiring care and dexterity causes its arms to get tangled. This Pokémon tends to leap into action before it thinks.
ZKN_OMEGA_069_000	Bellsprout's thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this Pokémon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.
ZKN_OMEGA_070_000	Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night, the Pokémon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.
ZKN_OMEGA_071_000	Victreebel has a long vine that extends from its head. This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal to attract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near, this Pokémon swallows it whole.
ZKN_OMEGA_072_000	Tentacool's body is largely composed of water. If it is removed from the sea, it dries up like parchment. If this Pokémon happens to become dehydrated, put it back into the sea.
ZKN_OMEGA_073_000	Tentacruel has large red orbs on its head. The orbs glow before lashing the vicinity with a harsh ultrasonic blast. This Pokémon's outburst creates rough waves around it.
ZKN_OMEGA_074_000	The longer a Geodude lives, the more its edges are chipped and worn away, making it more rounded in appearance. However, this Pokémon's heart will remain hard, craggy, and rough always.
ZKN_OMEGA_075_000	Graveler grows by feeding on rocks. Apparently, it prefers to eat rocks that are covered in moss. This Pokémon eats its way through a ton of rocks on a daily basis.
ZKN_OMEGA_076_000	Golem live up on mountains. If there is a large earthquake, these Pokémon will come rolling down off the mountains en masse to the foothills below.
ZKN_OMEGA_077_000	Ponyta is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. This Pokémon becomes stronger by stumbling and falling to keep up with its parent.
ZKN_OMEGA_078_000	Rapidash usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However, when this Pokémon turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.
ZKN_OMEGA_079_000	Slowpoke uses its tail to catch prey by dipping it in water at the side of a river. However, this Pokémon often forgets what it's doing and often spends entire days just loafing at water's edge.
ZKN_OMEGA_080_000	Slowbro's tail has a Shellder firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can't be used for fishing anymore. This causes Slowbro to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.
ZKN_OMEGA_081_000	Magnemite attaches itself to power lines to feed on electricity. If your house has a power outage, check your circuit breakers. You may find a large number of this Pokémon clinging to the breaker box.
ZKN_OMEGA_082_000	Magneton emits a powerful magnetic force that is fatal to mechanical devices. As a result, large cities sound sirens to warn citizens of large-scale outbreaks of this Pokémon.
ZKN_OMEGA_083_000	Farfetch'd is always seen with a stalk from a plant of some sort. Apparently, there are good stalks and bad stalks. This Pokémon has been known to fight with others over stalks.
ZKN_OMEGA_084_000	Doduo's two heads never sleep at the same time. Its two heads take turns sleeping, so one head can always keep watch for enemies while the other one sleeps.
ZKN_OMEGA_085_000	Watch out if Dodrio's three heads are looking in three separate directions. It's a sure sign that it is on its guard. Don't go near this Pokémon if it's being wary—it may decide to peck you.
ZKN_OMEGA_086_000	Seel hunts for prey in the frigid sea underneath sheets of ice. When it needs to breathe, it punches a hole through the ice with the sharply protruding section of its head.
ZKN_OMEGA_087_000	Dewgong loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this Pokémon sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.
ZKN_OMEGA_088_000	Grimer's sludgy and rubbery body can be forced through any opening, however small it may be. This Pokémon enters sewer pipes to drink filthy wastewater.
ZKN_OMEGA_089_000	From Muk's body seeps a foul fluid that gives off a nose-bendingly horrible stench. Just one drop of this Pokémon's body fluid can turn a pool stagnant and rancid.
ZKN_OMEGA_090_000	At night, this Pokémon uses its broad tongue to burrow a hole in the seafloor sand and then sleep in it. While it is sleeping, Shellder closes its shell, but leaves its tongue hanging out.

ZKN_OMEGA_092_000	Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this Pokémon cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.
ZKN_OMEGA_093_000	Haunter is a dangerous Pokémon. If one beckons you while floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This Pokémon will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.
ZKN_OMEGA_094_000	Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
ZKN_OMEGA_095_000	Onix has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this Pokémon does not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes increasingly rounder and smoother.

ZKN_OMEGA_097_000	Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this Pokémon searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.

ZKN_OMEGA_100_000	Voltorb was first sighted at a company that manufactures Poké Balls. The link between that sighting and the fact that this Pokémon looks very similar to a Poké Ball remains a mystery.
ZKN_OMEGA_101_000	Electrode eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days when lightning strikes, you can see this Pokémon exploding all over the place from eating too much electricity.
ZKN_OMEGA_102_000	This Pokémon consists of six eggs that form a closely knit cluster. The six eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear on the eggs, Exeggcute is close to evolution.
ZKN_OMEGA_103_000	Exeggutor originally came from the tropics. Its heads steadily grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall off, they group together to form Exeggcute.
ZKN_OMEGA_104_000	Cubone pines for the mother it will never see again. Seeing a likeness of its mother in the full moon, it cries. The stains on the skull the Pokémon wears are made by the tears it sheds.

ZKN_OMEGA_106_000	Hitmonlee's legs freely contract and stretch. Using these springlike legs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its legs and loosens the muscles to overcome fatigue.

ZKN_OMEGA_108_000	Whenever Lickitung comes across something new, it will unfailingly give it a lick. It does so because it memorizes things by texture and by taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.

ZKN_OMEGA_122_000	Mr. Mime is a master of pantomime. Its gestures and motions convince watchers that something unseeable actually exists. Once the watchers are convinced, the unseeable thing exists as if it were real.

ZKN_OMEGA_134_000	Vaporeon underwent a spontaneous mutation and grew fins and gills that allow it to live underwater. This Pokémon has the ability to freely control water.
ZKN_OMEGA_135_000	Jolteon's cells generate a low level of electricity. This power is amplified by the static electricity of its fur, enabling the Pokémon to drop thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made of electrically charged needles.
ZKN_OMEGA_136_000	Flareon's fluffy fur has a functional purpose—it releases heat into the air so that its body does not get excessively hot. This Pokémon's body temperature can rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.
ZKN_OMEGA_137_000	Porygon is capable of reverting itself entirely back to program data and entering cyberspace. This Pokémon is copy protected so it cannot be duplicated by copying.
ZKN_OMEGA_138_000	Omanyte is one of the ancient and long-since-extinct Pokémon that have been regenerated from fossils by people. If attacked by an enemy, it withdraws itself inside its hard shell.

ZKN_OMEGA_140_000	Kabuto is a Pokémon that has been regenerated from a fossil. However, in extremely rare cases, living examples have been discovered. The Pokémon has not changed at all for 300 million years.
ZKN_OMEGA_141_000	Kabutops swam underwater to hunt for its prey in ancient times. The Pokémon was apparently evolving from being a water dweller to living on land as evident from the beginnings of change in its gills and legs.
ZKN_OMEGA_142_000	Aerodactyl is a Pokémon from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from genetic material extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies in ancient times.
ZKN_OMEGA_143_000	Snorlax's typical day consists of nothing more than eating and sleeping. It is such a docile Pokémon that there are children who use its expansive belly as a place to play.
ZKN_OMEGA_144_000	Articuno is a legendary bird Pokémon that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this Pokémon flies, snow will fall.
ZKN_OMEGA_145_000	Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokémon that has the ability to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds. The Pokémon gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.
ZKN_OMEGA_146_000	Moltres is a legendary bird Pokémon that has the ability to control fire. If this Pokémon is injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.
ZKN_OMEGA_147_000	Dratini continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.
ZKN_OMEGA_148_000	Dragonair stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter weather conditions in its vicinity by discharging energy from the crystals on its neck and tail.
ZKN_OMEGA_149_000	Dragonite is capable of circling the globe in just 16 hours. It is a kindhearted Pokémon that leads lost and foundering ships in a storm to the safety of land.
ZKN_OMEGA_150_000	Mewtwo is a Pokémon that was created by genetic manipulation. However, even though the scientific power of humans created this Pokémon's body, they failed to endow Mewtwo with a compassionate heart.
ZKN_OMEGA_151_000	Mew is said to possess the genetic composition of all Pokémon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will, so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.
ZKN_OMEGA_152_000	In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy, friendly atmosphere all around.

ZKN_OMEGA_154_000	The fragrance of Meganium's flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe's fighting spirit.
ZKN_OMEGA_155_000	Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. The flames are vigorous if the Pokémon is angry. However, if it is tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.
ZKN_OMEGA_156_000	Quilava keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames and gusts of superheated air. This Pokémon applies its outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foe with flames.
ZKN_OMEGA_157_000	Typhlosion obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames. This Pokémon creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.
ZKN_OMEGA_158_000	Despite the smallness of its body, Totodile's jaws are very powerful. While the Pokémon may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.
ZKN_OMEGA_159_000	Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.
ZKN_OMEGA_160_000	Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.
ZKN_OMEGA_161_000	When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.
ZKN_OMEGA_162_000	Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.
ZKN_OMEGA_163_000	Hoothoot has an internal organ that senses and tracks the earth's rotation. Using this special organ, this Pokémon begins hooting at precisely the same time every day.
ZKN_OMEGA_164_000	Noctowl never fails at catching prey in darkness. This Pokémon owes its success to its superior vision that allows it to see in minimal light, and to its soft, supple wings that make no sound in flight.
ZKN_OMEGA_165_000	Ledyba secretes an aromatic fluid from where its legs join its body. This fluid is used for communicating with others. This Pokémon conveys its feelings to others by altering the fluid's scent.
ZKN_OMEGA_166_000	It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live Ledian in countless numbers. There is a good reason for this—the Pokémon uses the light of the stars as its energy.
ZKN_OMEGA_167_000	The web spun by Spinarak can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that this Pokémon can determine what kind of prey is touching its web just by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web's strands.
ZKN_OMEGA_168_000	Ariados's feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. This Pokémon constricts the foe with thin and strong silk webbing.
ZKN_OMEGA_169_000	If this Pokémon is flying by fluttering only a pair of wings on either the forelegs or hind legs, it's proof that Crobat has been flying a long distance. It switches the wings it uses if it is tired.
ZKN_OMEGA_170_000	Chinchou lets loose positive and negative electrical charges from its two antennas to make its prey faint. This Pokémon flashes its electric lights to exchange signals with others.
ZKN_OMEGA_171_000	Lanturn is nicknamed "the deep-sea star" for its illuminated antenna. This Pokémon produces light by causing a chemical reaction between bacteria and its bodily fluids inside the antenna.
ZKN_OMEGA_172_000	Pichu charges itself with electricity more easily on days with thunderclouds or when the air is very dry. You can hear the crackling of static electricity coming off this Pokémon.
ZKN_OMEGA_173_000	On nights with many shooting stars, Cleffa can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance through the night and stop only at the break of day, when these Pokémon quench their thirst with the morning dew.
ZKN_OMEGA_174_000	Igglybuff's vocal cords are not sufficiently developed. It would hurt its throat if it were to sing too much. This Pokémon gargles with freshwater from a clean stream.
ZKN_OMEGA_175_000	As its energy, Togepi uses the positive emotions of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokémon. This Pokémon stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell, then shares them with others.

ZKN_OMEGA_177_000	Natu cannot fly because its wings are not yet fully grown. If your eyes meet with this Pokémon's eyes, it will stare back intently at you. But if you move even slightly, it will hop away to safety.

ZKN_OMEGA_179_000	Mareep's fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.

ZKN_SHIELD_003_000	A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.

ZKN_SHIELD_005_000	If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
ZKN_SHIELD_006_000	Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.

ZKN_SHIELD_008_000	It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.
ZKN_SHIELD_009_000	The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.
ZKN_SHIELD_010_000	Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
ZKN_SHIELD_011_000	Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can't withstand a harsh attack.
ZKN_SHIELD_012_000	It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.

ZKN_SWORD_000_000	
ZKN_SWORD_001_000	There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
ZKN_SWORD_002_000	When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
ZKN_SWORD_003_000	Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
ZKN_SWORD_004_000	It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
ZKN_SWORD_005_000	It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
ZKN_SWORD_006_000	It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.
ZKN_SWORD_007_000	When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.
ZKN_SWORD_008_000	It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.
ZKN_SWORD_009_000	It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.
ZKN_SWORD_010_000	For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
ZKN_SWORD_011_000	It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
ZKN_SWORD_012_000	In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

Text File : zukan_comment_ultramoon_usa.msbt

Text File : zukan_comment_x_usa.msbt
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

ZKN_X_002_000	There is a plant bulb on its back. When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said to blossom into a large flower.
ZKN_X_003_000	By spreading the broad petals of its flower and catching the sun's rays, it fills its body with power.
ZKN_X_004_000	The flame on its tail indicates Charmander's life force. If it is healthy, the flame burns brightly.
ZKN_X_005_000	It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe. It then tears up the fallen opponent with sharp claws.
ZKN_X_006_000	When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.
ZKN_X_007_000	It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.
ZKN_X_008_000	When tapped, this Pokémon will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.
ZKN_X_009_000	It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

ZKN_Y_000_000	
ZKN_Y_001_000	For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
ZKN_Y_002_000	When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.
ZKN_Y_003_000	After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
ZKN_Y_004_000	From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
ZKN_Y_005_000	When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to unbearably high levels.
ZKN_Y_006_000	Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.
ZKN_Y_007_000	Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.
ZKN_Y_008_000	It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.
ZKN_Y_009_000	The pressurized water jets on this brutal Pokémon's shell are used for high-speed tackles.
ZKN_Y_010_000	Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
ZKN_Y_011_000	This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
ZKN_Y_012_000	The wings are protected by rain-repellent dust. As a result, this Pokémon can fly about even in rain.
ZKN_Y_013_000	Its poison stinger is very powerful. Its bright-colored body is intended to warn off its enemies.
ZKN_Y_014_000	While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
ZKN_Y_015_000	May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.
ZKN_Y_016_000	It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.
ZKN_Y_017_000	Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
ZKN_Y_018_000	It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate enemies. It races through the skies at Mach-2 speed.
ZKN_Y_019_000	Its fangs are long and very sharp. They grow continuously, so it gnaws on hard things to whittle them down.
ZKN_Y_020_000	The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food.
ZKN_Y_021_000	Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
ZKN_Y_022_000	It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
ZKN_Y_023_000	Moving silently and stealthily, it eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.
ZKN_Y_024_000	To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.
ZKN_Y_025_000	It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.
ZKN_Y_026_000	It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity, instantly downing foes several times its size.
ZKN_Y_027_000	Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.

ZKN_Y_030_000	When feeding its young, it first chews the food into a paste, then spits it out for the offspring.

ZKN_Y_032_000	Its large ears are flapped like wings when it is listening to distant sounds. It extends toxic barbs when angered.

ZKN_Y_034_000	One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

ZKN_Y_036_000	A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.

ZKN_Y_040_000	The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
ZKN_Y_041_000	It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echolocation to flit about in darkness.
ZKN_Y_042_000	Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.
